text: "Sturmmaske auf (Intro)" is a song recorded by German rapper's Kollegah and Farid Bang for their third collaborative studio album Jung, brutal, gutaussehend 3 (2017). The single was made available for digital download and streaming on 28 September 2017 through Alpha Music Empire, Banger Musik and BMG. "Sturmmaske auf (Intro)" was written by Kollegah and Farid Bang, while production was handled by German producers Joznez and Johnny Illstrument. == Background and composition == On September 21, 2017 Kollegah and Farid Bang announced the single on their Instagram and Facebook Accounts. "Sturmmaske auf (Intro)" was digitally released on September 28, 2017, through Alpha Music Empire, Banger Musik and BMG as the first single of Kollegahs and Farid Bangs third collaborative studio album Jung, brutal, gutaussehend 3. It was written by Kollegah and Farid Bang, while production was handled by German producer Joznez, along with additional production from Johnny Illstrument. A "gangster rap" song, "Sturmmaske auf (Intro)" features a violin-choir-beat and aggressive lyrics. ==Track listing== *Digital download #"Sturmmaske auf (Intro)" – 3:52 ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |} ==References== Category:2017 singles Category:2017 songs Category:Number-one singles in Germany Category:Kollegah songs
title: Sturmmaske auf (Intro)
